title: React: Testing and Debugging
author: Emmanuel Henri
description: Learn how to test, debug, and optimize your React code with tools like Jest, Chrome, ESLint, and flow.

title: Building and Deploying a Full-Stack React Application
author: Carl Peaslee
description: Discover how to architect, create, and deploy a scalable, full-stack React application.

title: React: Ecosystems
author: Emmanuel Henri
description: Learn how to make full use of React by exploring its ecosystems, and investigating what React offers as the nucleus of this system.

title: React.js Essential Training
author: Eve Porcello
description: React is a great choice for dynamic, data-driven user experiences. Learn how to create browser-based apps and websites with the component-based React.js library.

title: Learning Redux
author: Alex Banks
description: Explore Redux, the JavaScript library for managing client data, and learn how to build a data layer for an interface made of React components.

title: Building an App with React.js and MeteorJS
author: Emmanuel Henri
description: Looking for a new programming project? Learn how to build a data-driven, cross-platform app with the data management capabilities and reusable UI components in MeteorJS...

title: Learning Full-Stack JavaScript Development: MongoDB, Node, and React
author: Samer Buna
description: Learn by doing! Learn full-stack JavaScript development by building a web application with MongoDB, Node.js, and React.js, in this hands-on JavaScript programming course.

title: Learning React.js
author: Eve Porcello
description: Learn React.js. Get started building reusable user interface components with React, the JavaScript framework for UI developers.

title: Building a Web Interface with React.js
author: Ray Villalobos
description: Learn how to create flexible, fast, and lightweight web interfaces, including web forms, with React.js.

title: Create a CRM Mobile Application with React Native
author: Emmanuel Henri
description: Learn how to develop a CRM (customer relationship management) mobile app using React Native. This course shows how to set up a project, code the login...

title: Learning React Native
author: Alex Banks
description: Learn how to build apps in JavaScript using React Native. This course shows how to set up and run an app, work with components and views, leverage platform...

title: From React to React Native
author: Emmanuel Henri
description: Explore the different components that make up a basic React Native application, and learn how to use this platform to build your own native iOS and Android apps.

title: React Native: Building Mobile Apps
author: Steven Emmerich
description: Create native mobile apps—with native performance—using React Native, Firebase, and MobX.

title: Building Material Design Apps on Android with React Native
author: Linton Ye
description: Go through real examples of using React Native to build interfaces for Android apps that follow material design principles.

title: GraphQL: Data Fetching with Relay
author: Emmanuel Henri
description: Streamline data retrieval in your React.js applications. Learn how to build a GraphQL server and use Relay to fetch data from React components.

title: Learning GraphQL
author: Eve Porcello
description: Learn how to get started with GraphQL, the popular query language designed to make data fetching and updating easier.
